Text:
The samir_ar account is a Trusted account that was hacked into and used to upload fake torrents.
When this was discovered, the account was locked, and the fakes deleted.
I have now unlocked the account.
Go here to get a new password: https://thepiratebay.org/recover

When you have problems with a TPB account, you should contact us in the forum: https://forum.suprbay.org
instead of creating new accounts.
